item.title: How I Use SWHKD in My Workflow
item.description: SWHKD is the project that I have been working on for the past few months as a part of Google Summer of Code for this year. Now that we are done with the development process, I want to talk about why I wanted to improve the project. Although the easy answer is to get paid or to get a more production facing OSS development experience, for me, the most important driving force is using it in my own workflow.
